title: Rock Toons : A Cartoon History of the First 30 Years of Rock 'n' Roll
description: 8 1/4" x 11 1/4" approx. size - with 103 very colorful cartoon pages. Starts with 1954 Doris Day, Sinatra, Dean Martin then to Fats Domino, Chuch Berry and onto Folk Rock, Country Rock, Disco and onto the Elvis and The Beatles, Michael Jackson & everyone in between. The First 30 Years of Rock n' Roll - The Music That Changed the world!
author: Serge Dutfoy
